body_html:
@mkolod Thanks for filing this issue!

Switching to libjpeg-turbo sounds like a reasonable thing to investigate. We welcome contributions!

If anyone is going to attempt this, probably the two areas to focus on are:

  1. Benchmarks showing the actual performance when used within TensorFlow.
  2. A breakdown of the portability tradeoffs between the two libraries.

Adding @prb12 @poxvoculi since they might be interested, and might know some of the history behind why libjpeg was chosen over libjpeg-turbo (if any).

body:
@mkolod Thanks for filing this issue!

Switching to libjpeg-turbo sounds like a reasonable thing to investigate.  We welcome contributions!

If anyone is going to attempt this, probably the two areas to focus on are:
1. Benchmarks showing the actual performance when used within TensorFlow.
2. A breakdown of the portability tradeoffs between the two libraries.

Adding @prb12 @poxvoculi since they might be interested, and might know some of the history behind why libjpeg was chosen over libjpeg-turbo (if any).
